alert.note: Alert for Forest; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Forest, southeastern Oneida and north central Langlade Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Crandon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pearson around 620 PM CDT. Woodlawn and Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gagen, Lennox, Post Lake, Starks, Pelican Lake, Nashville, Mole Lake and Monico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
